name: YouTube Cosmic Panda for VidLii
description: This is a modification of the YouTube Cosmic Panda theme for VidLii.
additional_info:
MAKE SURE TO CHANGE YOUR VIDLII THEME TO COSMIC PANDA BEFORE USING THIS!
This is an all in one theme, but requires the original VidLii cosmic panda theme to function. 
https://www.vidlii.com/themes?t=QKfSkMB6zpT
MAKE SURE TO ADD THIS OR THE THEME WILL NOT WORK PROPERLY!
